translation: Sanjaya said, Having heard that speech of Lord Krishna, Arjuna, with joined palms, trembling, prostrated himself, again addressing Krishna in a choked voice, bowing down, overwhelmed with fear.
commentary: 11.35 This is that? Hearing having heard? Word speech? Keshavasya of Kesava? grateful with joined palms? Trembling: trembling? Kiriti Arjuna? bowing and prostrating (himself)? Bhuyah again? Eve even? Ah addressed? Krishna to Krishna? Sagadgadam in a choked voice? scared overwhelmed with fear? bowing down having prostrated.Commentary When anyone is in a state of extreme terror or joy he sheds tears on account of
